We promise you will enjoy our quality and simplicity

name: Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test, 30 Count
short_description: GET PREGNANT FASTER: vs not using any method. This test identifies your 2 most fertile days and is 2x more accurate vs calendar methods, providing you with the opportunity to get pregnant faster

OPTIMAL TIMING FOR CONCEPTION: Well-timed intercourse helps maximize your chances of getting pregnant. This easy at-home urine test detects your LH surge, providing a 48-hour window to maximize your chances of getting pregnant
OVER 99% ACCURATE at detecting the luteinizing hormone (LH) surge. Hormones are a more accurate predictor of ovulation than basal body temperature (BBT), which only rises after ovulation
EASY-TO-READ RESULTS: Clearblue Digital Ovulation Tests feature a unique ‘smiley face’ indicator that clearly shows your Peak Fertility days, allowing you to confidently plan intimate moments
#1 OB-GYN RECOMMENDED BRAND and #1 MOST-TRUSTED OVULATION TEST IN THE USA by American shoppers, according to the 2025 BrandSpark American Trust Study

EASIER THAN OVULATION STRIP TESTS: Our tests are simple to use, unlike traditional ovulation strips. Research shows 73% of women found strip tests challenging to read (based on a study of 111 women in the UK)
PERSONALIZED PREDICTIONS: The Clearblue Digital Ovulation Tests feature an Adaptive Algorithm that adjusts to your unique LH levels, detecting low LH surges below 25 mIU/ml
FREE PERIOD & CYCLE TRACKER APP: Timing is everything. Download our free app for smart testing guidance and well-timed intercourse. Log tests, track your cycle, get fertility predictions
product_description: Hoping for a bundle of joy? Track your cycles in our FREE app, designed for use with Clearblue Advanced Digital or Digital Ovulation Tests. Identifying your most fertile days is the best place to start. The Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test (Prueba de Ovulación Digital) is more accurate than calendar and temperature methods at predicting the most fertile days[1]. With Clearblue Digital Ovulation Tests, you can accurately identify your 2 most fertile days to maximize your chances of getting pregnant naturally. Each ovulation test kit includes 1 digital reader and 30 individually wrapped ovulation test sticks that track LH (luteinizing hormone), the hormone that surges just before you ovulate. The test sticks have an absorbent tip that can be used directly in your urine stream or dipped into a sample of urine in a clean, dry container. When you see that digital smiley face in the result window, you know it’s your best time to try for a baby. [1] Study of 101 women in the UK comparing a simple calendar method of conducting a test on LH surge day (2011). Ellis JE., et al. Human Reproduction (2011) 26: i76 (O-191)

name: Inito Fertility Test Strips | Pack of 30 | Compatible only with Inito Fertility Monitor | Compatible with iPhone Models only
short_description: 30-PACK REFILLS - Compatible only with iPhone models. A convenient 30 Pack of Inito Strips to use only with the Inito Fertility Monitor. Keep extra strips on hand for ongoing fertility tracking and charting from your phone.

4 FERTILITY HORMONE TEST - Inito is the only fertility monitor that measures Estrogen, LH, PdG (urine metabolite of progesterone), and FSH on a single test strip. You do not need to buy a new monitor with each cycle.

EASY TO USE - Simply dip your Inito test strip into urine for 15 seconds, attach your monitor to your phone, and insert the test strip into the monitor. You’ll get personalized results on the App within 10 minutes.

TRACK & CONFIRM OVULATION - Inito identifies 6 fertile days in your cycle by measuring Estrogen & Luteinizing Hormone (LH) levels. It also measures PdG (urine metabolite of progesterone) to confirm ovulation and FSH to track follicle growth.

MONTHS OF TRACKING - This 30-pack of strips can keep you stocked for your entire cycle. The number of tests depends on the irregularity and length of cycles. An average cycle length of 30 days may require 12-15 tests to track and confirm ovulation.
